channel.title: Need help port forwarding for linkSYS
channel.description: Someone had shown me how to port forward and I did exactly as he told me to do it but when my friend was gonna go on and try my server he said it keeps saying that the server is down. I also have no-ip and I also did the part when you have to type in your IP adress in the adress bar. So can someone please haelp me run up my server? :confused:

item.title: Need help port forwarding for linkSYS
item.dc:creator: @Bludragon Bludragon
item.description:
@Bludragon wrote:

My local area connection is is different. Mine has a red X next to it and it says that network cable is unplugged. How can i fix this?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Bludragon wrote:

Lol. Thats the same exact tut I used to port forward but when I ask my friends to try my server they say its down. But when you have to type in your server in the “Port Range” do you put in the “no-ip.org” or do you just put in the name?

Read full topic
